channel.title: Saving files?
channel.description:
Hi there,
Everytime i save changes in my server, the changed files will not be able to use in game (like ::starter and ::ipban (name).
In which files do i have to save my stuff? just in client.java or in other files too? And do i have to compile my server again when im done with that? Btw, im a newby in creating a server, so dont flame on me:S ;D Ciao ciao, Dreetje

item.title: Saving files?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You’ve missed out a curly bracket ({/}) somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Saving files?
item.dc:creator: @dreetje dreetje
item.description:
@dreetje wrote:

It’s still not working:S i tried ::update 60. What to do than? I could log on onto my server.

As starter command i have: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(1037, 1);
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(1044, 1);
addItem(1046, 1);
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1053, 1);
addItem(1055, 1);
addItem(1057, 1);
addItem(1419, 1);
addItem(995, 50000000);
sendMessage(“This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on HellzScape!”);
starter = 1;
}
else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack!”);
}
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 06:25:54 AM[/size][hr]one error:S i can type it up here:

client.java:32199: reached end of file while parsing

What’s that?

Read full topic

item.title: Saving files?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Update is just a nice way to shut it down. You have to compile it, and are there any errors when you compile?

Read full topic

item.title: Saving files?
item.dc:creator: @pking_nubs3 pking nubs3
item.description:
@pking_nubs3 wrote:

Try ::update 60 on your server and let it update
See if that works, -Pking Nubs3
